thread.title_full: Enemy attacked Dnipropetrovs'k region with drones and artillery: information is being clarified | УНН

author: Julia Kotwicka
title: Enemy attacked Dnipropetrovs'k region with drones and artillery: information is being clarified | УНН
text: Enemy attacked Dnipropetrovs'k region with drones and artillery: information is being clarified Kyiv • UNN Invaders shelled Nikopol district of Dnipropetrovs'k region with kamikaze drones and artillery. The district center, Marhanetska and Myrivska communities were attacked, there were no casualties, and the damage is being investigated. The enemy attacked Dnipropetrovs'k region several times. Information about the damage is being clarified. This was reported by the head of the Dnipropetrovs'k RMA Serhiy Lysak, according to UNN. Details Last night and since early morning, the invaders used kamikaze drones and artillery to shell Nikopol district of Dnipropetrovska oblast. According to information, the district center, as well as Marhanets and Myrovska communities were attacked. Fortunately, there were no civilian casualties. At the same time, information on the material damage caused by the aggressor is still being clarified.
